prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon that resembles a fox and has sparkling blue fur.
I want a Pokemon with pointy ears and icy blue features, perfect for snowy environments.
Generate a cute quadruped Pokemon with a shimmering icy tail and delicate wings.
Make a frosty creature with a playful personality and a sleek, elegant form.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in cold habitats, featuring a light blue color scheme.
Design an adorable ice-elemental creature with unique frost-like fur and big ears.
Show me a Pokemon with a slender body and a cheerful demeanor, set in a winter landscape.
